This is a paragraph in my first post. Show off your Markdown!

Heading Two

Any text with no empty lines between will become a paragraph. Leave an blank line between headings and paragraphs. Font can be Italic or Bold. Code can be highlighted with backticks.

Hyperlinks look like this GitHub Help.

A bullet list is created using *, +, or -, like:

  • dog
  • cat
  • muffin

A numbered list is created using a number + ., like:

  1. one
  2. two
  3. three
  4. four
